# PDFPrintScalingMode.pageScaleDownToFit

**Case**

Scale large pages down to fit the paper size (smaller pages do not get scaled up).

## Declaration

```swift
case pageScaleDownToFit
```

## Enumeration Cases

- **PDFPrintScalingMode.pageScaleNone**: Do not apply scaling to the page when printing.
- **PDFPrintScalingMode.pageScaleToFit**: Scale each page up or down to best fit the paper size.

items.description: Do not apply scaling to the page when printing.
